Class Reporting

java.lang.Object
Reporting
public class Reporting extends Object
The Reporting class creates a reporting object, which holds all the Branch objects and uses methods to get certain statistics on about all the branches.

  • Method Details

    • getBranches

      public ArrayList<Branch> getBranches()
      A getter for the branches attribute.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of branch objects.

    • setBranches

      public void setBranches(ArrayList<Branch> branches)
      A setter for the branches attribute.
      Parameters:
      branches - an ArrayList of branch objects.

    • addBranch

      public void addBranch(Branch branch)
      A method to add a single branch to the branches ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      branch - a Branch object.

    • largestSaleEver

      public int largestSaleEver()
      A method to get the largest sale from all branches by looping through all branch objects and getting the highest value from each one and comparing them to each other,to find the highest.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the largest sale ever done by a branch.

    • salesAboveValue

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Sale>> salesAboveValue(int desiredValue)
      A method to get all sales in all branches which have a value above a certain amount. This is done by taking an ArrayList of an ArrayList of sales and then looping through all branches and finding all values above in that branch and adding them to ArrayList of an ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      desiredValue - an integer value of a desired amount for all sales value to be greater than.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of an ArrayList of sales that represents all sales above a certain amount.

    • highestAverageSaleInYear

      public String highestAverageSaleInYear(int desiredYear)
      A method to find the highest average sale of houses in a certain year. This is done by looping though all branches, then through all the sales in that branch. Then finding all the sales within the desired year and calculating the average within that branch.
      Parameters:
      desiredYear - an integer value representing the year for finding the average.
      Returns:
      a String representing the name of the branch with the highest average in a given year.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      This allows for easier reading of a Reporting object
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a String representing a Reporting object.
